data.title: Rakuten × Golden State Warriors Special Webpage
data.meta_description: Rakuten is proud to be an official partner and the first-ever jersey-badge partner of the seven-time NBA Champion the Golden State Warriors. Browse video, news and more.
data.text:
Rakuten is proud to be an official partner

and the first-ever jersey-badge partner

of the seven-time NBA Champion Golden State Warriors.

Rakuten is also a founding partner of Chase Center, the state-of-the-art sports and

entertainment venue, home of the Warriors.

The Warriors' unselfish, team-oriented play and their historic achievements embody

the passion for positivity, transformation and success that Rakuten stands for.

With shared values of optimism and empowerment,

Rakuten and the Warriors are working to provide fans with

world-class experiences in sports and entertainment

and striving for on-going local community impact.

Rakuten is proud to be an official partner and

the first-ever jersey-badge partner

of the seven-time NBA Champion the Golden State Warriors.

Browse video, news and more.

The Warriors are a model for the basketball of today. Rakuten is a model for todayâs business innovation.

Together, these two great brands can provide new and moving experiences in sports and entertainment.

The Warriors' unselfish, team-oriented play and their record achievements embody

the passion for positivity, transformation and success that Rakuten stands for.

Rakuten will support Warriors players and

fans alike to achieve their dreams, while at

the same time we work towards achieving

our mission of empowering society and individuals.
